content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

Compare the role of the legislatures in China and Iran. In your comparison, you should do the following:
Define unicameral legislature.
Choose two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries that are unicameral. Describe the source of power for those institutions.
Explain the implications of the different sources of power on the legislative function within each government for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (b).

frqParts.text:

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
